title: I like the Vi nerfs Riot, I have a suggestion to look at if Vi's state seems healthy after a while.
body:
I like how you specifically reduced her ganking pressure while keeping her lategame/laning power for more versatility with the champion.

If it is possible, when Vi's popularity goes down; give her a small bonus AD ratio on Q or R to stand up to her "Assassin" tag in the shop, to give lane Vi a reason to be played. 

Thank you for 5.5 patch by the way, best patch in forever. :)

replies.body: If you are a low mobility mage, adc, or support that is really squishy. Vi IS an assassin. If not shes just a fighter, Vi is healthy these nerfs wont change much, people just need to learn how to play against Vi, her Q is very dodgeable and a flash after her ult is an easy escape most of the time if you have full hp
